Example 2:  Award Adjustments
Situation
:  A Veteran without dependents whose pension was reduced under
38 CFR 3.551(c)
is now discharged from nursing home care at VA expense.
Result/Rationale
:  Restoration of the full pension benefit is not an
“increased award” within the meaning of
38 CFR 3.31
.  It is an adjustment to restore the previous rate.  Adjust the award effective the date of discharge.
Note
:  The same principle applies if aid and attendance benefits are reduced under
38 CFR 3.552
.
